DOC.detailed_description: This randomize study compare efficacy induce weight loss two treatment arm base Colorado Diet . Subjects randomly assign one two study arm instruct follow Colorado Diet participate weekly State Slim group class . Subjects follow study one year . The Colorado Diet consist 3 phase : phase 1 ( week 1-2 ) , phase 2 ( week 3 - 8 ) , phase 3 ( week 9 - 16 ) . The maintenance phase last month 5 - 12 . Body weight monitor study visit body composition determine use DXA . Blood lipid lipoprotein concentration , health & wellness questionnaire , fitness measure also assess throughout study .
